programme.title: Sox A Family's Best Friend
programme.desc: When two families come together by marriage, the new brothers struggle to unite and are eventually brought together by a magical dog named Sox.

programme.title: Paper Tales
programme.desc: Animation series “Paper Tales” narrate to children audience in fascinating way amusing adventures of paper animals – a moose named Aristotle and a woodpecker named Knock-Knock – in paper land where everything is made only from paper. Merry adventures come together with entertaining insets “for crafty hands” when the audience learns how to produce all cartoon characters using paper, cardboard, scissors and glue. The project is supported with the site where all flat patterns are provided with the advices how to manufacture the paper world items.This is the way spectator gets involved into a peculiar game that brings out creative work and development of many useful practical skills, distracting kids from permanent attachment to a computer. The “Paper Tales” project is a fascinating and helpful alternative to computer-oriented pastime. The whole cartoon is accompanied by off-screen narrator’s text and exuberant flow of gags. Each episode is planned to last for 5 minutes (a version without insets – 4 minutes). Technique of performance is 3D computer graphics imitating paper application work.

programme.title: Camp Cool Kids
programme.desc: At their summer camp competition games, Spence and his big brother Zach find themselves on opposing teams: it’s the dweebs against the bullies. Can Spence make new friends, overcome his fears, stand up to the bullies and win a trophy in the process?

programme.title: Ollie! The Boy Who Became What He Ate
programme.desc: Ollie is a 6-year-old with a massive imagination, often lost in his own world - flipping, sliding, climbing and rocket-blasting through the house, practicing at being the master of all things. But even masters need to stop and refuel. When meals or snack time interrupt Ollie’s play, he finds himself confronted with the real challenge of childhood; trying new food. To escape his predicament, Ollie uses his magic spoon to transport himself, along with his sister Poppy, and her stuffy Nummy, to a food planet filled with adventure and the very food Ollie stuck his spoon into.

programme.title: Roger
programme.desc: The lively adventures of a little girl, the carefree, joyful and occasionally perky Fatou, and an alien, the clumsy Roger, on a tropical island… Throughout their adventures, they trigger small accidents that sometimes grow into major disasters, but (almost) always end on a happy note. In short, Roger and Fatou spend their time saving the island from their own mistakes and blunders.

programme.title: Plum the Super Witch
programme.desc: Plum is a perfectly normal 6-year-old witch who lives fun adventures trying to stop Elizandra from destroying her city.

programme.title: AnimaCars
programme.desc: Jonny and the Rescue Team work hard to maintain peace. Every day there's a new challenge, every day a new chance for adventure.

programme.title: Talking Tom and Friends
programme.desc: Things get even more epic in Season 3 as Talking Tom and Friends try new ways to make their dreams come true, making more friends (and enemies) along the way!

programme.title: VIP Pets
programme.desc: We are the VIP Pets! The coolest pets with a passion for hair! We are best friends and together we will discover lots of beautiful hairstyles and go on exciting adventures!

programme.title: Back to Back
programme.desc: Embark on an electrifying journey as they boldly leap from one heart-pounding expedition to the next, fueled by their unbreakable bond and insatiable thirst for excitement. Get ready to be swept away in a whirlwind of adrenaline-pumping quests, where danger and discovery await them at every turn.

programme.title: Bat Pat
programme.desc: The series follows the comedy adventures of Bat Pat and the Silver brothers Martin, Leo and Rebecca as they unravel mysteries and cross paths with supernatural creatures of the night that lurk, haunt, shriek and dig themselves up in every dark corner of their home in Fogville, a small town that seems to be the center of all things weird in the world, a veritable magnet to ghosts, mummies, witches, creatures, werewolves and things that go bump in the night. Bat Pat will prove that the supernatural isn’t always evil but just misunderstood. Our heroes will come to understand something important: the supernatural “bad guys” are not really bad, but normal people whose actions are misunderstood by the more inhabitants of Fogville and what they really want is... just help!

programme.title: TOBOT
programme.desc: Ryan and Kory are twin brothers with one big secret: They’re Tobot pilots.

programme.title: Winx Club
programme.desc: Winx Club is a fantasy saga revolving around six fairies and their adventures. The protagonists Bloom, Stella, Flora, Aisha, Tecna and Musa live their daily life on Magix world, among lessons, loves, quarrels and moments of strong friendship. At any moment, when needed, they can transform into super-heroines, ready to defeat evil and save who is in danger.

programme.title: Grojband
programme.desc: The story about 12 year old Corey that emotionally torments his sister so that she will write the ultimate lyrics for his garage band.

programme.title: Monsuno
programme.desc: The series revolves around re-awakened Monster DNA, called Monsuno, that finds its way into the unsuspecting hands of adventure-seeking teenagers Chase, Jinja, and Bren. Accompanied by their Monsuno, Lock, Charger, and Quickforce, they are searching for Chase's father Jeredy Suno, the creator of the Monsuno

programme.title: Paper Tales
programme.desc: Animation series “Paper Tales” narrate to children audience in fascinating way amusing adventures of paper animals – a moose named Aristotle and a woodpecker named Knock-Knock – in paper land where everything is made only from paper. Merry adventures come together with entertaining insets “for crafty hands” when the audience learns how to produce all cartoon characters using paper, cardboard, scissors and glue. The project is supported with the site where all flat patterns are provided with the advices how to manufacture the paper world items.This is the way spectator gets involved into a peculiar game that brings out creative work and development of many useful practical skills, distracting kids from permanent attachment to a computer. The “Paper Tales” project is a fascinating and helpful alternative to computer-oriented pastime. The whole cartoon is accompanied by off-screen narrator’s text and exuberant flow of gags. Each episode is planned to last for 5 minutes (a version without insets – 4 minutes). Technique of performance is 3D computer graphics imitating paper application work.

programme.title: Magic Lantern
programme.desc: Animation series “Magic Lantern” tells little viewers wonderful adventure stories, based on classic literature plots. Little video games fan Mike and his smart sister Kate watch and discuss each story presented as a strip film. Funny stories will help seeing classic stories from the new side and prove that world classic literature is exciting and interesting.

programme.title: Invent'Tom
programme.desc: Meet Tom, Car City’s very own inventor! In his high-tech lab, he creates the wackiest inventions to solve his friend’s problems.

programme.title: Pincode 101-102
programme.desc: Grown up Kikoriki characters rock the world with their scientific superpowers and tell the kids scientific facts in a most entertaining way. The crew follows Captain Pin as they learn about the world we live in and share this knowledge with us.

programme.title: RoboFuse
programme.desc: Robo works tirelessly with his loyal friends to protect Car City from Zitron's constant schemes to steal the city's energy source.

programme.title: Tiny Town
programme.desc: Join the friendly vehicles of Tiny Town as they play games, go on adventures and solve problems together.

programme.title: Lily's Lovely Song
programme.desc: Lily and Tim create beautiful clay worlds inspired by English nursery rhymes. Sing along to lovable tunes in each episode.

programme.title: One Zeez
programme.desc: The One Zeez make music as they explore our world, learning to stomp like a dinosaur, flip like a shark and jiggle like skeletons.

programme.title: Ted the Train
programme.desc: All aboard the learning express! Ted is a train who teaches children about colours, animals, fruits, vegetables and more.

programme.title: Construction Squad
programme.desc: The Construction Squad builds Car City brick by brick! They're proof that everything's possible with a little help from our friends.

programme.title: Babies in Car City
programme.desc: The Babies are curious little cars whose sense of wonder always leads them into fantastic adventures—and sometimes trouble!

programme.title: MINITUNS
programme.desc: MINITUNS presents an exciting and fun selection of children's songs, perfect to enjoy, dance and sing with the family. A world full of colors and melodies, designed to teach counting, care for the planet and enjoy the game.

programme.title: Ollie! The Boy Who Became What He Ate
programme.desc: Ollie is a 6-year-old with a massive imagination, often lost in his own world - flipping, sliding, climbing and rocket-blasting through the house, practicing at being the master of all things. But even masters need to stop and refuel. When meals or snack time interrupt Ollie’s play, he finds himself confronted with the real challenge of childhood; trying new food. To escape his predicament, Ollie uses his magic spoon to transport himself, along with his sister Poppy, and her stuffy Nummy, to a food planet filled with adventure and the very food Ollie stuck his spoon into.

programme.title: Heroes of Envell
programme.desc: Present days. Saint Petersburg. Four friends – Art, Kira, Phil and Vic are the coolest gamers in school. Eventually they find a suspicious laptop with «Heroes of Envell» game installed on it. Turns out that this very laptop is a portal to another dimension, a game realm which is full of adventures and real-life danger. The game realm is a blend of medieval, steampunk and futurism. You never know what really awaits our heroes. Just like the design of the game, the game logic is very unpredictable. You start with a quest and then it becomes a race right until it all grows into a tricky brainteaser. But be sure about one thing – there is no boring or easy way in here. The game realm is a blend of medieval, steampunk and futurism. You never know what really awaits our heroes. Just like the design of the game, the game logic is very unpredictable. You start with a quest and then it becomes a race right until it all grows into a tricky brainteaser. But be sure about one thing – there is no boring or easy way in here.

programme.title: Sprinter Galore
programme.desc: The good-hearted Sprinter Galore is back at his home planet, battling evil villains bent.
